name: Survive Wrench Junior
description: "SWR" is a REALLY short horror game about being in Wrench's (from Watch Dogs 2) garage, and meeting Junior. Its supposed to be a nightmare, so thats why the posters in the walls say what they say. Its not me venting while making posters in Ibis paint at 1AM when I wake up at 6AM, I swear... This is my first creation in unity, and probably one of the lasts, but I enjoyed the making!
